author: Staff Reporter
text: An ATM facility, established at Kovilpatti Head Post Office, was inaugurated by C. Raju, MLA, on Friday in the presence of V. Ramasamy, Senior Superintendent of Post Offices, Kovilpatti division and S. Kannabiran, Revenue Divisional Officer. Similar facility has been set up at Arumuganeri and Thoothukudi post offices. Srivaikuntam would have one soon. In Kovilpatti Division, around seven lakh postal savings accounts are being maintained and among the account holders, nearly 23,000 have opened ‘Selva Mahal’ savings account.
title: ATM opened in Kovilpatti HPO
